arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x1
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the start point of the cubic curve segment.

arguments.name: y1
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the start point of the cubic curve segment.

arguments.name: ctrlx1
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the first control point of the cubic curve segment.

arguments.name: ctrly1
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the first control point of the cubic curve segment.

arguments.name: ctrlx2
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the second control point of the cubic curve segment.

arguments.name: ctrly2
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the second control point of the cubic curve segment.

arguments.name: x2
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the end point of the cubic curve segment.

arguments.name: y2
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the end point of the cubic curve segment.
